formatDescription: AutoCAD Block Attribute Template file is used when extracting attribute information from a drawing which creates a text file for use with database software. Signatures based on v. 2005, 2006, 2008 versions. Any information which can help us expand these signatures would be valuable.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.115)- Added two internal signatures and updated description. Submitted by National Archives and Records Administration.
